title: maruvakadhaya mOhananga
sahitya:
maruvakadaya mOhanAnga nApai 



(maruvaka)







anupallavi







haridAsulanu AdarincEdi birudulugala parama dayAkara



(maruvaka)







caraNam







japamerugalEnu tapamerugalEnu kapaTa kOpa veSa garbhapurivAsa



aparAdhamula manninci Adarinca ipuDu ninnu neranamminAnu ranga



(maruvaka)
